text: Kare wa, anata gata ni mieru hashira mo nashi ni sho ten o tsukuri, mata chijo ni wa shikkari to yamayama o suete anata gata to tomoni guratsukanai yo ni nasa reru. Shushuzattana dobutsu o sore ni maki chirasa reru. Mata ware wa, ten kara ame o furase, iroirona migotona mono o soko ni shiyu de seiiku sa seta
